DOC.brief_summary: Cesarean delivery ( CD ) common inpatient surgery US , account nearly one third birth annually . In last decade , CD rate increase approximately 50 % , almost 1.3 million procedure perform 2012 ( Hamilton 2013 ) . CDs associate increase major maternal morbidity ( Silver 2010 ) , correspond increase length inpatient care follow delivery frequency hospital readmission ( Lydon-Rochelle 2000 ) . Organizations include Healthy People , American College Obstetricians Gynecologists ( ACOG ) , American College Nurse Midwives target reduce CD rate important public health goal decade ; however , identify intervention achieve goal proven challenge . Repeat CDs significant contributor increase cesarean rate , result combination rise rate primary CD decrease rate vaginal birth cesarean ( VBAC ) , decline high 28.3 % 1996 ( Guide 2010 ) 9.2 % 2010 ( Hamilton 2011 ) . Why VBAC rate decrease dramatically remain subject debate ; extent change drive patient preference know . An NIH consensus conference statement note `` informed consent process TOLAC Elective Repeat Cesarean Delivery ( ERCD ) evidence-based , minimize bias , incorporate strong emphasis value preference pregnant woman , '' recommend `` interprofessional collaboration refine , validate , implement decision-making risk assessment tool '' accomplish goal ( Cunningham 2010 ) . Our group recently create decision tool , refer Prior CD App ( PCDA ) , help English- Spanish-speaking TOLAC-eligible woman deliver hospital offer TOLAC consider individualize risk assessment , incorporate value preference , participate share decision make process provider make informed decision delivery approach . We conduct randomize study effect Prior CD App TOLAC VBAC rate , well number aspect decision quality .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women exactly one prior Cesarean Delivery . 2 . Current singleton pregnancy . 3 . Gestational age , 1624 week . 4 . English Spanish speaker . 5 . Must receive prenatal care one participating center . 1 . Contraindications vaginal delivery ( e.g. , placenta previa , prior classical cesarean , previous uterine rupture ) . 2 . Prior VBAC .
